mods.abstract: Consists of a web crawl of unique URLs tweeted with the #panamapapers hashtag. #panamapapers collection took place from April 4-29, 2016. Unique URLs were extracted from the dataset, and harvested with Heritrix on May 1-7, 2016.

mods.note: This research was supported by a research grant -- 435-2015-0011 -- issued by Social Sciences and Humanities Research Council.
